snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar news. Thursday's selection includes items on a behind-the-scenes look at Madonna's Super Bowl halftime performance and a Spotify mix for the Obama...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar news. Thursday's selection includes items on a behind-the-scenes look at Madonna's Super Bowl halftime performance and a Spotify mix for the Obama presidential campaign.
lead_paragraph: Here are the interesting things that the tech reporters and editors for The New York Times found on the Web on Tuesday. Find more Scuttlebot items here.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Madonna's Special Effects and Obama's Playlist
